Name: ImageExtractor
Description: This sample applies image extraction on the cardholder image and  embeds a custom watermark on it.
Requirements: No requirements needed for this sample.
Instructions: Click new to create a new cardholder.
Click on the blank picture on the top left and select Genetec ImageExtractor.
Select a picture from your device and click Open.
Clicking the picture shows the watermark on the bottom right.
Result: Cardholder picture is embedded with watermark.
Title: Image Extractor
